channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News

item.title: Movies and TV Shows Coming to Netflix in June 2025
item.description: 🎥 Lights, camera, music! June 2025 on Netflix is gonna be 🔥🎶 Which soundtrack are you most excited for? #musicnews #NetflixJams

item.title: Lady Gaga’s ‘Wednesday’ Character Confirmed, First Six Minutes of Season Two Released
item.description: 🎶 Get ready to dive back into the world of Lady Gaga's 'Wednesday'! 🌟 Season Two's first six minutes are here! 💥 #LadyGaga #WednesdaySeries

item.title: Miley Cyrus Talks Pop Star Peers, ‘Winding Down’ Her Focus on Mainstream Success After ‘Something Beautiful’
item.description: Just spilling the tea with Miley 🍵 Who else is ready for her next chapter? 👀💫 #MileyCyrus #NewMusicWhoDis

item.title: Stranger Things Season 5 Reveals Three-Part Release Date
item.description: 🚀 Get ready to groove! Stranger Things Season 5 drops release date bombshell! Mark your calendars for the epic three-parter! 🎶📺 #StrangerThings #Season5Hype

item.title: Guillermo del Toro’s Frankenstein Trailer Is Alive, ALIVE!: Watch
item.description: 🧟‍♂️🎬 Dive into the monstrous world of Guillermo del Toro's Frankenstein trailer! It's ALIVE, ALIVE! 🎶 #Frankenstein #GuillermoDelToro
